abstract: The number of debit card reward programs declined from last year, a Bankrate.com study finds. But there are still plenty out there.
snippet: The number of debit card reward programs declined from last year, a Bankrate.com study finds. But there are still plenty out there.
lead_paragraph: Even though debit card reward programs are getting harder to find, most of the programs remaining haven't changed much - at least, not yet.

headline.main: Debit Cards With Rewards Not Extinct (Yet)
